person.bio: Ex Apple, Ex Silicon Valley, full stack developer, meditator, blockchain wizard, 20 years experience as software architect, mobile app developer, and full stack developer.
person.excerpt: Wizard of Integrity @ SEEDS, Hypha Ltd
